name: The Chase (itch) (redpandatma, Abhijit Sonkar)
description: Who is the hero and who is the villain? Are you your own demon? Can you outrun your own self. The Chase, is a proof of concept from the philosophical aspect of you are your own villain with idea of mirror verse. Can you fight against your demon or can you outrun it? Lastly, who is the real demon between you an yourself? This forms the very twist of this game set in an unlimited runner hypercasual style game playthrough. Where you get to play from the perspective of two characters who antagonize each other.
